segments.text: My attention keeps going back to that poor boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is just so unstable, it's tilting backward quite dramatically.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It really looks like it's about to tip over at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched so far, his balance must be severely compromised.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe he's putting himself in such a dangerous situation just for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if he falls and hits his head on the counter or the floor?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me furious that an adult isn't paying attention to this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The potential for injury here is very high, and it's completely avoidable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He needs to get down from there right now before something terrible happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl is just standing there, encouraging him!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is a recipe for disaster, and it frustrates me deeply.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to step in and prevent this accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm genuinely concerned for his safety in this moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
